original_title: 夫の目の前で犯されて― 出張先の相部屋で
overview: Ami, a part-time housewife, goes on a business trip to Fukuoka with her boss, Oshima. The person in charge of the Fukuoka branch invites the relieved two people to dinner after successfully completing her work. Ami is completely drunk after being treated to local cuisine and local sake. Oshima, who stares at her with lewd eyes, calls the hotel she had reserved.
title: I Got Fucked In The Shared Room I Got During My Business Trip – Ami Kiyo
